mapper.select: SELECT * FROM re_comments ORDER BY rcmt_num
mapper.insert: insert into re_comments(rcmt_num, cmt_num, cus_num, rcmt_cnt, rcmt_date) values (rcmt_seq.nextval, #{cmt_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcmt_cnt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.delete: delete from re_comments where rcmt_num = #{rcmt_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
delete from re_comments where cmt_num = #{cmt_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
